events.title: Inception
events.summary: A mind-bending thriller by Christopher Nolan.
events.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

events.title: Breaking Bad
events.summary: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.
events.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to create and distribute the drug.

events.title: Champions League Final
events.summary: The biggest match in European club football.
events.description: Watch the two best teams in Europe battle it out for the Champions League trophy.

events.title: The Matrix
events.summary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality.
events.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
